titles.title: Federal Employees' Compensation Reform Act of 2011
A bill to amend chapter 81 of title 5, United States Code, to provide for reform relating to Federal employees workers compensation.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S485-486)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
